articles.title: ‘Is he going through crack withdrawal?’ – Tweeps react to Trevor Noah’s dance moves - The Citizen
articles.description: A short video clip of Trevor Noah showing off his dance moves has South Africans wondering if he left his rhythm in America.
articles.content:
Comedian and The Daily Show host Trevor Noah has been holidaying in South Africa with his American actress girlfriend, Minka Kelly.
The couple has been spending time in the Western Cape with Noahs g… [+1769 chars]
